description:
Power your run with the comfortable, performance-ready fit and Indestructawool technology of these Athlete Edition Run Mosaic Pieces Print Crew Socks. The unique mosaic print adds some color to your run, while the crew height adds extra coverage for your ankles. Plus, with body-mapped mesh zones for added breathability, your feet will feel light as air with every mile.

  • Indestructawool™ technology with extended durability zones
  • 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit
  • Shred Shield™ technology reduces wear from toes
  • Mesh zones for added breathability
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced comfort
  • Women's Specific Fit
name: Smartwool Athlete Edition Run Mosaic Pieces Print Crew Socks - Women's
